body_html:
Thank you!

sum(1, True) worked.

I'm not sure what version I'm using but apparently sum takes one of

  • no arguments
  • (int dim)
  • (int dim, bool keepdim)

P.S. That was an awesome response time, thanks again!

body:
Thank you!

sum(1, True) worked.

I'm not sure what version I'm using but apparently sum takes one of
* no arguments
 * (int dim)
 * (int dim, bool keepdim)

P.S. That was an awesome response time, thanks again!
